options: ['Pulmonary function testing', 'Echocardiography', 'Cardiopulmonary exercise testing', 'CBC to assess for anemia', 'Chest CT scan']

This study can reveal underlying changes consistent with CHF, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), or interstitial lung disease.
